donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: Improved capacity of the Ministry of Justice in review and revision of laws, administration and law enforcement  and access to justice to the people especially through legal aid

The Programme aims at strengthening the capacity and the efficiency of the key institutions of the Justice Sector to sustain a peaceful state where freedoms and human rights are fully protected, respected and promoted in order to achieve the EDPRS objectives.

Output 1. Capacities of the justice sector in the areas of administration of justice and  law enforcement enhanced

outputs.output_descr: Strengthening the capacity of the Rwanda National Police in community policing and crime prevention
